caption.p: Biophysical properties of PUFAs. Titration curve for oleic acid/sodium oleate. ( a) The plot indicates the regions for the formation of micelles, vesicles and oil droplets as a function of pH; Negative staining ( b) and cryo ( c) electron microscopy images of samples of DHA in the absence (− α-syn) and in the presence (+α-syn) of the protein. The arrows indicate the oil droplets. Taken, with permission, from [ 113, 120].
